Forgejo Runner.description:
Forgejo Actions runner. Self-host a CI runner for Forgejo instances such as codeberg.org.

Based on a custom docker image from the Rockstor maintainers. Available for amd64 architecture only.
Forgejo Runner.more_info:
Intended as a Docker-in-Docker (dind) capable instance.

Auto enables privileged mode, and automount re host docker service.

Auto configures: -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock

TOKEN.description: Token from the Forgejo instance: Settings - Actions - Runners - 'Create new runner'
TOKEN.label: Registration 'TOKEN'

NAME.description: Display name (no spaces) within the Forgejo instance.
NAME.label: Runner name [e.g. SelfHosted]

PGID.description: 'docker' Group ID on this install: required for Docker-in-Docker.
PGID.label: Docker PGID [SYSTEM - GROUPS 'docker']
